desc.welcome-desc: You can now write cross-platform web applications. See changes in real time and build to multiple platforms with one command. If you're not already familiar with it, you can get help from the documentation page below, or run some pre-written example code.
desc.second-desc: You have moved to the second screen! There is nothing here!

sdCardImport.title: SD-Cards import
sdCardImport.desc: Select a SD-Card or Folder you want to import

validateFolder.title: Validate Folder
validateFolder.desc: Select a folder you want to validate, it will check if all recordings are in the correct folder and the naming is correct

sync.title: Syncronize
sync.desc: Select a folder you want to syncronize, it will check if all recordings are in the correct folder and the naming is correct
